nodes.text: Docking Bay 84 was a docking area in the Coruscant Spaceport, located near the Senate Plaza on the Galactic Republic's capital planet of Coruscant. In 3643 BBY, during the Cold War with the Sith Empire, a team of kidnappers from the Black Sun criminal syndicate attempted to escape to the spaceport as a diversion after they succeeded in kidnapping the Republic scientist Eli Tarnis from the Senate Tower. They were pursued by the Padawan Kira Carsen and a team Coruscant Security Force agents, and the two sides were locked in a stalemate in the hangar until a Jedi Knight—the former apprentice of Jedi Master Orgus Din—arrived. Working with Carsen and the CSF agents, the Knight broke through the criminals' lines and defeated their leader—a man named Zeer, who revealed that they were a decoy, and that Tarnis was really in Black Sun territory.
Docking Bay 84 appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, as a class-restricted map for the Jedi Knight mission "Kidnapped!" on Coruscant.
